tape( 'the function returns an error if provided a `{{param}}` option which is not {{desc}}', function test( t ) {
	var values;
	var err;
	var i;

	values = [
		{{values}}
	];

	for ( i = 0; i < values.length; i++ ) {
		err = validate( {}, {
			'{{param}}': values[i]
		});
		t.equal( err instanceof TypeError, true, 'returns a type error when provided '+values[i] );
	}
	t.end();
});
